scripts.build:sqlite-otel: rm -rf dist/sqlite-otel && mkdir -p dist/sqlite-otel/docs && cp static-home/index.html dist/sqlite-otel/ && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/* dist/sqlite-otel/docs/ && echo 'Build complete - static homepage at root, MkDocs docs at /docs/'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist
